info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 7:48AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG OR FREEZING FOG MAY LINGER UNTIL 9 AM THIS MORNING... A few spots will linger around freezing until 830 AM this morning. Primarily within river valleys across southeast Georgia. Patchy dense fog or freezing fog will linger early this morning, dissipating by 9 AM. It is possible that slick spots have developed on bridges, overpasses, and elevated walkways. Shaded areas may see these slick surfaces remain until 9 AM this morning. Motorist and pedestrians should anticipate low visibility and some slick surfaces this morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down and leave extra distance ahead of you in case a sudden stop is needed.
